title: Ticket #6828: Make package version accessible from condor_version
description: We have a request to provide the package version (8.8.0-1) available. Note the "-1", we have occasionally had a "-2" release.
remarks:
2018-Nov-20 09:24:05 by tim:
The plan is augment the conversion output as follows for packaged builds (RPMs and DEBs): 

$CondorVersion: 8.4.4 Feb 03 2016 BuildID: 355883 PackageID: 8.4.4-1 $
$CondorPlatform: x86_64_RedHat6 $

Tarball and Windows builds will omit the PackageID in the output.

2018-Dec-11 14:33:28 by jfrey:
Code Review

This change looks good.
